org.GameLogic.Communication.GameRunner

  • Packages that use GameRunner 
    Package Description
    org.GameLogic.Communication  

    • Uses of GameRunner in org.GameLogic.Communication

      Classes in org.GameLogic.Communication that implement GameRunner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EndedGameCycle
      After the game is finished, spectators have the possibility to see the game.
      class  StandardGameCycle
      This implementation of GameRunner is meant for a typical game that is either not started, paused or in progress.
